fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Choose a card type and a player. The next non-duel won card of that type they play becomes trapped.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Choose a card type and a player. The next 3 non-duel won cards they play of that type become trapped. 

*Active until activated. Trapped means the card mechanically counts as not being played. The target player will learn they were Trapped.*
